text: ds one through 12. Each of the five Cloistered races was responsible for the evolution of one pair of these new morphogenetic fields. Each sphere became the morphogenetic field for one Root Race plus its companion Cloister Race that would simultaneously manifest into physical expression on Earth, during the time periods that corresponded to the dimensional DNA strand to which each race was appointed. These five morphogenetic fields became Root Races 3—7, through which DNA strands 2—6 would be assembled. 15
